caddy                       = service.testdomain.tailnet.gnx
tailnet.route                 = /path/*
tailnet.route.0_uri           = strip_prefix /path
tailnet.route.1_rewrite       = * /api{path}
tailnet.route.2_reverse_proxy = {{upstreams https 5000}}
----------
service.testdomain.tailnet.gnx {
	route /path/* {
		uri strip_prefix /path
		rewrite * /api{path}
		reverse_proxy https://target:5000
	}
}
